name: Phasemix
tagline: Phasemix pipes and filters for your blog
body:
### Welcome to Phasemix.
Phasemix builds a blog website in 3 simple steps:

> 1. Edit 
> 2. Compose
> 3. Publish

1. Edit your content in any tool that exposes their data through an API such as Tumblr, Wordpress. 2 Compile new HTML files using phasemix generators. 3. Publish the generated HTMLs.

Right now Phasemix just supports Tumblr as a content source and Google Web Starter Kit as the template to generate the new htmls.

### Watch it working
You can check Phasemix working on the project's author weblog as http://robertoallende.com which is the generated HTML being hosted on Google Cloud Storage which was created from the content at http://en.robertoallende.com for english content and http://es.robertoallende.com

### Support or Contact
Any comment or question, don't hesitate to write in our group at https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/phasemix
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
